::: {class=welcome_head}
## Hi, I'm S. Bassirou DIOP
:::

I am a PhD student in Geography/Ecosystems and Environment/Hydrology, with a passion for Data Science, Geographic Information Systems (GIS), programming languages (especially R and Python), statistics, and hydrology. I hold a Master's degree in Geography (Specialization: Ecosystems and Environment; Mention: Hydrology). Subsequently, I joined the [IRD/AFD CECC project](http://www.projet-cecc.org/) to pursue a PhD thesis in alternation between France (Espace-Dev (Univ. Montpellier, IRD), Montpellier, France) and Senegal (Laboratoire Leïdi “Dynamique des territoires et développement”, Univ. Gaston Berger), focusing on climate change and hydrological and statistical modeling of extremes events.

Feel free to contact me via [mail](mailto:09.bachir.diop.10@gmail.com) and subscribe to my email newsletter.
